Title: M&PP train, engine number 6, engine type 0-4-2
Alternate Title: Manitou & Pike's Peak train, engine number 6, engine type 0-4-2
Creator: Perry, Otto, 1894-1970.
Summary: Passenger trainrear view, 1 car. Photographed: leaving Manitou, Colo., July, 1918.
Description: 1 photonegative ; 9 x 14 cm.; 1 photoprint (postcard) : silver gelatin, b&w ; 8 x 13 cm.
Is Part Of: Otto C. Perry memorial collection of railroad photographs.
